product_name: New Balance M870v3 Road-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: The New Balance M870v3 Road-Running shoes provide stability, support, and shock absorption thanks to the medial posts built into the EVA midsoles that help prevent overpronation. Nylon mesh uppers feature synthetic overlays for support; polyester/nylon blend linings move moisture away from the feet for extended comfort. EVA midsoles absorb shock, cushion feet and provide gentle support. Medial Post consists of higher-density compression-molded EVA, located on inside edge of shoe, to help prevent overpronation. Blown rubber outsoles on the New Balance M870v3 Road-Running shoes grip the ground for amazing traction.
